name: Festive Showcase: Akitsu Harpastum
description: A vibrant display board featuring the mascot of the game "Akitsu Harpastum." Apparently, the decision to make it a bake-danuki in a straw hat can be attributed to a certain housekeeper, who chose it for its childlike charm. After all, the act of reminiscing on childhood dreams is itself just another type of dream â€” in other words, undeniably on-theme.
